alert.note: Alert for San Luis Obispo (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flash Flood Warning issued August 21 at 3:52PM PDT until August 21 at 6:45PM PDT by NWS Oxnard
info.description: The National Weather Service in Los Angeles/Oxnard has issued a * Flash Flood Warning for... Southeastern San Luis Obispo County in the Carrizo Plains in southwestern California... * Until 645 PM PDT. * At 352 PM PDT, Doppler radar indicated a strong and nearly stationary thunderstorm producing heavy rain across the warned area. Flash flooding is ongoing or expected to begin shortly. HAZARD...Thunderstorm producing life threatening flash flooding. SOURCE...Radar. IMPACT...Life threatening flash flooding of creeks and streams, highways, streets and underpasses. * Some locations that will experience flash flooding include... Carrizo Plain. FLASH FLOOD...RADAR INDICATED FLASH FLOOD DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Be aware of your surroundings and do not drive on flooded roads.
